[FAMINE] Goodness gracious, you spoil me! Finally you have come to understand the respect I deserve, the accolades, the appreciation! I didn’t realize that all this time I had such a devout fan, now I am more motivated than ever to grace you with my speech!
FAMINE hugs himself tightly in joy, and appears to reverse in age by another 5 years. He looks like he is in his late thirties now.
[FAMINE] Ok, back to slowing things down now. I have a story to tell you so listen up…
